hero.title: Your Ultimate Online Tech Store Is Coming Soon!
hero.description: We're working hard to bring you the ultimate tech shopping experience, delivering authentic and top-notch technologies and innovation to your doorstep without lifting a foot. Uganda, are you ready? Join our WhatsApp channel for exclusive early-bird deals!

products.name: iPhone 14
products.description: Experience the latest innovation with the iPhone 14, featuring a stunning 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display, a powerful A15 Bionic chip, and an advanced dual-camera system that captures life's moments with precision.
features: Advanced dual-camera system for stunning photos and videos
6.1-inch Super Retina XDR display for an immersive viewing experience
A15 Bionic chip for fast performance and efficient battery life
Long-lasting battery life for up to 12 hours of internet use
Fast charging for quick top-ups(Up to 50% charge in just 30 minutes)

specifications.charging: Fast charging (up to 50% in 30 minutes), Wireless charging
